r.s: PHP's asynchronous concurrent distributed networking framework
r.d: PHP's asynchronous concurrent distributed networking framework. - event-driven - full asynchronous non-blocking - multi-thread reactor - multi-process worker - millisecond timer - async MySQL - async task - async read/write file system - async dns lookup - support IPv4/IPv6/UnixSocket/TCP/UDP
r.n: - Check close fd is not timer_fd - TCP_DEFER_ACCEPT option - socket LINGER option - Fixed eof_check memory error - Added swoole_event_set - Added swoole_client out_buffer - Added socket linger option - Fixed the swoole_server->close destroy out_buffer bug - Using php_error_docref - Fixed swoole_async_dns_lookup warning
